original_text: So he who was over the palace, and he who was over the city, together with the elders and the guardians, sent to Jehu, saying, “We are your servants, and we will do all that you tell us. We will not make anyone king. Do whatever is good in your eyes.”
korean_text: 그 왕궁을 책임지는 자와 그 성읍을 책임지는 자와 장로들과 왕자를 교육하는 자들이 예후에게 말을 전하여 이르되 우리는 당신의 종이라 당신이 말하는 모든 것을 우리가 행하고 어떤 사람이든지 왕으로 세우지 아니하리니 당신이 보기에 좋은 대로 행하라 한지라

sentences.original_text: So he who was over the palace
and he who was over the city
together with the elders and the guardians
and we will do all that you tell us
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리에게 말하는 모든 것을 하겠습니다

sentences.original_text: We will not make anyone king
Do whatever is good in your eyes.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 눈에 선한 것을 무엇이든지 행하소서
